---
author: Jen Chung
date: Dec 17, 2016 8:35 am
title: It's Snowing In NYC! Enjoy It Before It Turns Gross
---

	
										<p>Did you wake up to the sound of snow plows scraping the street? The <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20161219185719/http://gothamist.com/2016/12/16/forecast_cold_today_snow_tonight_ra.php">snow is here</a>, and there may be up to two inches!</p>

<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-captioned="" data-instgrm-version="7" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:62.4537037037037% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div> <p style=" margin:8px 0 0 0; padding:0 4px;"> <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20161219185719/https://www.instagram.com/p/BOHqWMpBDH8/" style=" color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;" target="_blank">Snow! #MoshuluParkway #Bronx #NYC #NewYorkCity #BoogieDown #Snow #MTA #4Train #ADayInTheLife</a></p> <p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;">A photo posted by @c.sosa89 on <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2016-12-17T13:20:29+00:00">Dec 17, 2016 at 5:20am PST</time></p></div></blockquote> <script async defer src="//web.archive.org/web/20161219185719js_/http://platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>

<p><br><br>
Unfortunately this winter wonderland will turn into freezing rain and possibly sleet soon before it turns to rain:</p>

<center><blockquote class="twitter-tweet" data-lang="en"><p lang="en" dir="ltr">Within the hour snow will be changing to freezing rain and perhaps briefly to sleet. Thereafter from south to north it changes to plain rain <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20161219185719/https://t.co/qcJycDTMxl">pic.twitter.com/qcJycDTMxl</a></p>&#x2014; NWS New York NY (@NWSNewYorkNY) <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20161219185719/https://twitter.com/NWSNewYorkNY/status/810110131522441216">December 17, 2016</a></blockquote>
<script async src="//web.archive.org/web/20161219185719js_/http://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script></center>

<p>So enjoy this while you can!</p>

<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-captioned="" data-instgrm-version="7" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:50.0% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div> <p style=" margin:8px 0 0 0; padding:0 4px;"> <a href="https://web.archive.org/web/20161219185719/https://www.instagram.com/p/BOHqKNMgeB6/" style=" color:#000; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none; word-wrap:break-word;" target="_blank">Yes I had a moment!!
